reviews.review: It's Good But Easy To Hack And Many Cheaters In Game.

Игра топ)Только пофиксили бы тролей и читеров))

Broken game, cheaters every where, toxic team mates who cannot possibly have earned enough money to buy their own computer therefore feel the need to be toxic to the best of their ability and are trash at the game. Valve should consider producing a new game o of this nature which costs more than a packet of cigarettes which may help prevent cheater and children having multiple accounts and abusing the internet we have all come to love. Please feel free to respond to me directly if you have further questions.
custom player models, pay to win. Non-competitive casual game but it is free
it is a fun, cheap game, that valve continues to support. its biggest flaw is the lootboxes.

Place, where I think that I will forget all my problems and be happy but I only go angry.

Com tanto cheater que há no jogo chega a desanimar jogar mais de uma partida.
Antigamente quando o jogo era comprado era raro encontrar um cheater. 
Já hoje em dia, de cada 10 partidas, 8 tem cheater...
É lamentável!
Deveriam tornar ele pago novamente. 
Não vai resolver o problema totalmente, mas pelo menos o cara pensa 2 vezes antes de usar um hack pra não ter que comprar outra conta.
This game is fun to play, the matchmaking sucks hard though.

Why life so easy?
